notes: 62-year-old African-American man with left upper and lower extremity weakness, associated with dark visual spot in right eye, right facial numbness, facial drop and slurred speech. Hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. Smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
